name: test_e2e_with_logs[659_NOSQL_REDIS_002]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `NOSQL_REDIS_002` |
| **Name** | Redis CONFIG GET disclosure |
| **Category** | NOSQL_EXTENDED |
| **Subcategory** | redis |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
